events.name: Tech Saturday Season 3: Building a Rooftop Farm
events.description:
Sign up here: https://tinyurl.com/techsatsignup 

In Tech Saturday, volunteers will be using tech to address sustainability issues. We meet on Saturdays to learn and do projects together! Each project typically requires 8-10 weeks to complete.

This season, the people from Heartland Farmers will be working together with volunteers to build a vegetable farm on the roof of the United World College East Campus building, which is 7 stories high. Volunteers will be learning the intricacies behind setting up a small scale rooftop farm, picking a wide variety of Maker skills along the way. 

Third Season will be from 15th April to 3rd June 2017, every Saturday, from 2pm to 6pm

For our first meeting on 15th April 2017, we would:
- Conduct Project Briefing & Lab Induction
- Showcase a partial setup of the intended full farm setup
- Begin work on the initial infrastructure of the project.

Topics covered would include but are not limited to:
Basic hand tools and power tools handling
Basic woodworking
Farming with a Dutch Bucket System
Basic plumbing and irrigation techniques
events.location: Sustainable Living Lab (SL2), 1 Tampines Street 73, Singapore 528704

events.name: Master of Science in Technopreneurship & Innovation (Info Session)
events.description:
MSc Info Session 15th Apr 2017 (Saturday)
Time: 3:00pm - 6:00pm
Venue: Singapore Marriott Tang Plaza Hotel, Level 2, Legacy Suite
 Agenda
 3:00pm: Registration 3:30pm: Talk  - "From Entrepreneurship to Entreprisingship" by Associate Professor Hooi Den Huan, Director  of NTC 4:15pm: Introduction to MSc TIP and sharing by Alumni
 
Synopsis
Entreprising mindsets can make the critical difference between a “me-too” and an “outstanding” organization.
There are many businesses owned and run by entrepreneurs but few make it to a unicorn status, nor become a listed company nor become scaleable in size. For these few that make it, they are not run by ordinary entrepreneurs but by entreprisers.
In the non-business field, there are some organisations that stand out from the rest. What they do, is effectively different and often times are exemplary. These are run not by leaders/managers/volunteers but by entreprisers. 

* NTC reserves the rights to make changes according to circumstances
events.location: Singapore Marriott Tang Plaza, 320 Orchard Road, Singapore 238865
events.group_name: Nanyang Technopreneurship Center (NTC), Nanyang Technological University
